attributes.action: enact a Legal Right that any person may release any information and discuss any matter with a Member of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a result of the matters surrounding Damian Green, a Right needs to be defined; that any person, whether a United Kingdom citizen or not, should have an absolute Right to discuss any matter with a Member of Parliament, and that this Right, like the Human Rights Act, should be binding on all legislation.

It shall be the responsibility of the Member of Parliament to use such information divulged in a lawful manner. e.g the Member may not for example make public information protected by the Official Secrets Act, but is free to raise matters of concern with the Government.
